frontmatter.abstract: Select inputs are commonly used in Shiny for creating dropdown menus. Select inputs are easy to use, but they are not easy to style using CSS. An alternative solution is the listbox widget.
frontmatter.title: Listbox Widget

frontmatter.abstract: The app shiny-links replaces the previous examples on creating links to tabs and panels in shiny apps. I rewrote the previous method using a functional component and a Shiny Input Binding.
frontmatter.title: Creating Internal Links
